About me

Any fool can write code that a computer can understand. Good programmers write code that humans can understand.
Martin Fowler
Hi, my name is Tiago Amaro, and I am a brazilian developer living in Rio de Janeiro focused on web technologies. My current programming language is ruby and my favorite developing environment is SublimeText 3 (With Vintage package enabled :D).
